location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: General Department letter no. 1 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to James Farish, Secretary to Government in the Commercial Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus asks for instructions from Government on whether British ships were allowed to carry opium from Bushire to the Dutch settlements in India [the Dutch East Indies].
